title: Solidare
description: An application to help child out of school, cooperate with Rumah Zakat
details: Solidare is an application to help children who cannot go to school because of costs. People who care will easily channel aid through this application. We work together with Rumah Zakat.

Contributed as Android Developer who rebuilt an existing application to participate in the BRI Digital Challenge, a Hackathon held by BRI in 2015. We successfully passed and entered the top 20 out of 792 participants.

We are reached the peak of Hackathon Day on September 30 and October 1, 2016 at ICE BSD, first 121 finalists received workshop guidance or Pre Hackathon Day on September 23 at the BRI I Building Hall. At this stage, the finalists were given the opportunity to ask questions to sharpen the ideas, prototypes, and simulations of the digital solutions they offered.

title: Sleepy
description: An Android app to help you to get quality of Sleep
details: Sleepy is a smart application that helps people get sleep quality. By using a smartwatch that will monitor sleep data and a smartphone light & noise censor, the application can collect and provide tips and actions to do for better sleep.
Built with Java and Kotlin, Bluetooth connectivity, and S-Health library from Samsung

info.tech_stack: Java, Kotlin, Retrofit, XML, Bluetooth Smartwatch SDK, S-Health SDK, Postman, Laravel, PHP

title: Comrades
description: Smart application as a media for HIV/AIDS education and services.
details: Comrades is an application to help HIV/AIDS community and ODHA support each other, to remind ODHA about their ARV therapy, also as media education and information about HIV/AIDS.
Built with Java and Kotlin, Bluetooth connectivity for connecting to smartwatch and Smart box medicine for ARV.

info.tech_stack: Java, Kotlin, Retrofit, XML, Bluetooth Smartwatch SDK, Postman

title: Sistem Informasi Karya Mandiri
description: An smart IoT Android app for ODHA (People with HIV/AIDS)
details: Comrades is an application to help HIV/AIDS community and ODHA support each other, to remind ODHA about their ARV therapy, also as media education and information about HIV/AIDS.
Built with Java and Kotlin, Bluetooth connectivity for connecting to smartwatch and Smart box medicine for ARV.

title: Paytren OPT
description: Attendance Application by scanning QR code built with native Android
details: OPT is short of Orientasi Pebisnis Treni, so this is the annual event that held by Paytren for Mitra Paytren.

This app is support both for online and offline mode. When the organizer held an event at no signal area this app will collect attendance data to mobile disk first, then will upload to cloud if there's Internet connection.

title: Paytren EDC
description: An Android application to help face to face transactions
details: Face to face transaction like TopUp, Withdrawl with print receipt transaction by using Bluetooth connection.

info.tech_stack: Kotlin, Retrofit, XML, Bluetooth Printer API, Postman

title: Paytren 5.17
description: Paytren e-Money Application built with native Android and iOS
details: e-Money application from Paytren that have many features like PPOB, KYC, Pay by QRIS, Transfer, and chats.
Contribute to built Android for Transaction History with print to Bluetooth printer
Also contribute to built iOS for feature KYC

info.tech_stack: Swift, UIKit, Storyboard, Kotlin, Retrofit, XML, Bluetooth Printer API, Postman

title: Paytren Connect
description: iOS Application with IoT features
details: Paytren Connect is an smart application that you can use after upgrade to Mitra Bisnis Premier.
There are Smart chat, Smart media, Smart IoT, Smart link Apps, Smart Care, Smart Ads, and Smart Communication.

info.tech_stack: Swift, UIKit, Storyboard, Postman, Smartwatch, Bluetooth

title: Nazar.id
description: e-Commerce mobile Application and Mitra Nazar.id which integrated with Nazar.id app
details: Nazar.id is a public e-commerce application.
I'm here to develop Native Android and iOS Application and also lead Mobile Application Development.

info.tech_stack: Android, Java, Kotlin, Swift, Objective-C, UIKit, Storyboard, XML, Postman
info.client: PT. Sarana Media Investama Group, Nazar.id

title: InnoPlayer SDK
description: Media Player Mobile and TV SDK
details: Being part of RnD team at MNC Innovation Center I'm contributing on research to build Media Player SDK, InnoPlayer.
InnoPlayer is an media player SDK library that used for video, audio and live stream applications. Not only SDK for mobile application but also for large screen too, android tv.
For SDK documentation I'm also using Dokka, documentation engine for Kotlin.
InnoPlayer is available for native users and also for the framework Flutter. We adopt a method channel from the native SDK to make it available for Dart.

info.tech_stack: Android, Java, Kotlin, Media Player API, Chromecast, Dokka, Groovy, Maven, Dart, Method Channel

title: MNC Identifier SDK
description: MNC Identifier is a service to identify, and verify consumer with AI in it.
details: MNC Identifier is an smart identify SDK from MNC with AI. There are two main features in here.
1. Liveness Detection
Liveness Detection using mlkit face recognition to detect live person present at the point of capture.
2. OCR (Optical Character Recognition)
Optical Character Recognition using mlkit text recognition to detect text at the point of capture.
Contributing on research and development for OCR SDK library and optimizing to prevent Out of Memory

info.tech_stack: Android, Java, Kotlin, XML, ML Kit, Face Recognition, Text Recognition, Android Library

title: HK Toll App - iOS
description: An application to help you while you want and driving on the Highway, especially at toll.
details: Contribute to finishing development for some features and also bug fixing.

title: Aplikasi Inovasi Daerah
description: Regional Innovation Applications consist of: Public Services, Government Administration, Education, Social Disparities and others
details: This Regional Innovation is intended to encourage positive competition between provincial governments and between district/city governments in the implementation of regional government so that improved services to the community and increased development can be realized, in order to realize the welfare of the people.
I'm here as part-time iOS developer which have built from zero by using SwiftUI.

title: Bioskop Online
description: VOD streaming Mobile services
details: Bioskop Online is a Transactional Video On Demand (TVOD) service that presents quality local content created by the nation's children.
I'm here as part-time Android developer which have maintenance for add, enhancement some features and also bug fixing.

info.tech_stack: Android, Java, Kotlin, XML, Media Player API, ExoPlayer SDK

title: KBStar KB Bank
description: Mobile banking application from KB Bank
details: KBStar is mobile banking application from KB Bank (previously is Bukopin).
Revamp Mobile Application KBStar Bukopin using Flutter.
Contribute to module PPOB (Purchase, Payment & top-up e-wallet), module plus account, transaction history, and also create base Source of Funds widgets.

title: API PPOB Bank Nobu
description: Restful API for PPOB Sistem Bank Nobu
details: Join as Back-End developer to create Restful API by using Java Spring boot and Go-Lang.
Contribute to create Restful API for PPOB Product Management, Transaction History and Reporting.

info.tech_stack: Java, Spring, Go-Lang, Postgres, SQL, JSON

title: SES Audio Editor
description: SES is an smart audio application for Audio Editing.
details: SES is coming from research and development product at MNC for audio editing.
Main features of this application is recording, editing (Trim, Converter), and Audio Effect (Noise reduce & Tone).
I'm here has successfully built this app in just only 3 weeks by using Jetpack Compose.

title: Cubicle SDK
description: Video Editor SDK for video editing.
details: Cubicle is Video Editor SDK that allows other media projects to use this SDK for video editing.
Contribute to adding an Audio Editing module and add Link.

info.tech_stack: Java, Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, FFmpeg, Android Library, Maven

title: Ar-Risalah Lirboyo iOS App

details: Make e-Learning of pasantren Ar-Risalah Lirboyo available on iPhone
Built it with webview to embedded Ar-Risalah Lirboyo existing website system.

info.client: Karya Eka Nala, Pondok Pesantren Ar-Risalah

Especially on the Accounts module (including Profile, Purchase Package, Inbox, Terms and Conditions, and Customer Service Information)

- Interstitial Ads
- Move Catchup to Premium User
- Ads player

Also optimizing the load of some pages and bug fixes.
